features: Dove Men+Care Minerals + Sage Bar maintains hydration levels for healthier, stronger skin
Inspired by nature’s refreshers, minerals and sage
Delivers a boost of freshness that leaves your skin feeling renewed
Sage, peppermint and eucalyptus provide an energizing scent
Dove men's bars are developed specifically for men's skin
Cleanses without leaving skin feeling dry or tight like other men's bar soap
body.description: Dove Men+Care Minerals + Sage Bar is a men’s bar soap that works to not only give skin a strong cleanse, but also leave you feeling energized and renewed. Specifically developed for men’s skin, the refreshing formula delivers a boost of freshness with every use. With Dove’s ¼ moisturizing cream, this Dove Men+Care bar washes away dirt and oil. It’s a body and face bar that thoroughly cleans without irritating skin –for healthier, stronger skin. Clinically proven to help fight skin dryness, the Dove Men+Care bar won’t leave skin feeling tight and dry like ordinary bar soap. Discover the power of Dove Men+Care Elements with Dove Men+Care Minerals + Sage Bar. Using straightforward ingredients known for their freshness, such as sage, peppermint and eucalyptus, this energizing scent leaves you feeling renewed. This Dove Men+Care bar is suitable to use every day. For a maximum sense of energy and freshness, shower first thing in the morning with the Minerals + Sage Bar. Follow with a Minerals + Sage antiperspirant or deodorant to feel refreshed before starting the day. For best use, wet your Dove Men+Care bar fully in the shower and rub it in your hands to produce a light foam. Work it over your skin – its suitable for both face and body. Rinse thoroughly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Minerals + Sage Bar At a Glance: ¼ moisturizing cream maintains hydration levels for healthy-feeling skin Inspired by nature’s refreshers, minerals and sage Delivers a boost of freshness that leaves skin feeling renewed Sage, peppermint and eucalyptus provide an energizing scent #1 dermatologist recommended men’s brand* Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Bar With ¼ Moisturizing Cream From the #1 dermatologist recommended men’s brand*, Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Bar not only gives skin a strong cleanse, but also leaves you feeling energized and renewed. Specifically developed for men’s skin, the refreshing formula delivers a boost of freshness with every use. With Dove’s ¼ moisturizing cream, this men’s bar works to wash away dirt and oil. It’s a body and face bar that thoroughly cleans without irritating skin like regular bar soap can –for healthier feeling skin. *According to a 2016 independent survey conducted by IPSOS among US dermatologists. What’s in the Box: Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Bar, 4 Ounces, 6 Bars

Cleanses Without Leaving Skin Feeling Dry or Tight Clinically proven to help fight skin dryness, Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Bar won’t leave skin feeling tight and dry like ordinary bar soap. This body and face bar contains ¼ moisturizing cream to help keep skin looking healthy and strong.

Inspired by Nature for an Energizing Scent Using straightforward ingredients known for their freshness, such as minerals and sage, the energizing scent of Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Bar leaves you feeling renewed. For a maximum sense of energy and freshness, shower first thing in the morning with the Minerals + Sage Bar. Follow with a Minerals + Sage antiperspirant or deodorant to feel refreshed before starting the day.

Directions For best use, wet your Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Bar fully in the shower and rub it in your hands to produce a light foam. Work it over your skin – its suitable for both face and body. Rinse thoroughly.

Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Antiperspirant Dry Spray Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Body Wash Dove Men+Care Elements Minerals + Sage Fortifying Shampoo and Conditioner Recommended Dove Men+Care Elements Products Up to 48-hour odor and wetness protection Hydration for healthier, stronger skin Revitalizes hair with a fresh scent for up to 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite bar soap for men
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap. It smells so refreshing and invigorating. It makes your skin feel soft and refreshed. Especially good for your skin in winter when skin tends to get dry. Great product, fair price, set up automatic delivery and don't worry about forgetting to buy soap. Love being able to utilize this option with Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves this soap and I do too. It makes him come out of the bathroom like he actually showered. Not like other soaps where he goes into the shower and he comes out smelling in the same way. Or perhaps he finally found out how to use a soap. it’s a great value for the quantity of soap that you get and it lasts a really long time. I love it’s great quality soap and it doesn’t dry out your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent body soap for men
reviews.reviewText: This dove sage bar soap for men is amazing, I am sure women can use it as well. The fresh smell of sage and also other minerals makes this soap make you smell fresh and clean. It does not dry out your skin and I highly recommend this to everyone. The price is a great deal too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I buy this soap because it smells nice and some what helps with my dry skin in the winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap
reviews.reviewText: Love this soap. Moisturizes my skin and smells really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells the best
reviews.reviewText: I don't know why but I'm having a hard time finding this particular scent in stores. Smells the best of all the Dove Men+ line of soaps. Hopefully they didn't discontinue it. Glad I can still find it here for a comparable price

reviews.reviewTitle: I don't know whether it's a geniune product or not
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Received soaps in a terrible package and all the seals are open. I don't think so it's a geniune product. Don't buy
Es una lástima que lo hayan retirado o ya no esté disponible
